response.original_title: No. 20: Fragments of a Faith Forgotten
response.overview: In 1980, Harry Smith combined his two Wizard of Oz-related films (FILM NO. 16 and 19) and called the new work FILM NO. 20: FRAGMENTS OF A FAITH FORGOTTEN. The film was to premiere accompanied by a live score at an Anthology fundraising event at Alice Tully Hall, but, unfortunately, the event was canceled and it never screened. â€“ Anthology Film Archives
response.title: No. 20: Fragments of a Faith Forgotten

release_dates.note: World premiere of new restorations. Anthology Film Archives. New York, NY. U.S. https://www.anthologyfilmarchives.org/film_screenings/calendar?view=list&month=9&year=2025#showing-60032
